application.doc: Searching for session within a replica set

param.name: replica
param.doc: The name of the replica set.

param.name: max
param.doc: The maximum number of results to return for the search query.

param.name: pattern
param.doc: The pattern for user names to return sessions for. The '*' wildcard character can be used.

method.name: GET
method.id: Searching for session within a replica set
method.doc: To search for sessions within a replica set, issue an HTTP GET command on the DSC Administration sessions resource URI.

request.doc: The user name search pattern included in the URL must be URI encoded.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: total_session
param.doc: The total number of sessions on this replica set.

param.name: matched_sessions
param.doc: The sessions matching the search query.

param.name: user
param.doc: The user name who created the session.

param.name: date
param.doc: The date the session was created.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
